title: She Loves You
lyrics:
She (Em)loves you, yeah, yeah, yeah, she (A7)loves you, yeah, yeah, yeah
She (C)loves you, yeah, yeah, yeah, (G)yeah (G)
 
You (G)think you've lost your (Em7)love, when I (Bm)saw her yester(D)day
It's (G)you she's thinking (Em7)of, and she (Bm)told me what to (D)say
She says she (G)loves you, and you know that can't be (Em7)bad (yeah, yeah,yeah)
Yes she (C)loves you, and you (Am)know you should be (D)glad (D)
 
She (G)said you hurt her (Em7)so, she (Bm)almost lost her (D)mind
And (G)now she says she (Em7)knows, you're (Bm)not the hurting (D)kind
She says she (G)loves you, and you know that can't be (Em7)bad (yeah, yeah,yeah)
Yes she (C)loves you, and you (Am)know you should be (D)glad… Oooh
 
She (Em)loves you, yeah, yeah, yeah, she (A7)loves you, yeah, yeah, yeah
And with a (C↓↓↓)love like that, you (D)know you should be (G)glad (G)
 
And (G)now it's up to (Em7)you, I (Bm)think it's only (D)fair
And (G)pride can hurt you (Em7)too, ap(Bm)ologize to (D)her
She says she (G)loves you, and you know that can't be (Em7)bad (yeah, yeah,yeah)
Yes she (C)loves you, and you (Am)know you should be (D)glad… Oooh
 
She (Em)loves you, yeah, yeah, yeah, she (A7)loves you, yeah, yeah, yeah
And with a (C↓↓↓)love like that, you (D)know you should be (G)glad (G)
And with a (C↓↓↓)love like that, you (D)know you should be (G)glad (G)
And with a (C↓↓↓)love like that, you (D-stop)know you should… [wait]
Be (G)glaaaad! yeah, yeah, yeah
(Em) Yeah, yeah, yeah
(C) Yeah, yeah, yeah, (G-stop)yeaaaaaaaaah [end]
